channel.title: Random Crashes
channel.description:
[code]ClientHandler: Client Exempt pk disconnected Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client$2.execute(client.java:11823) at EventContainer.execute(EventContainer.java:69) at EventManager.run(EventManager.java:80) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
Thats a random crash that my server has tbh idk what it even means.

its delta(of course) and I think its when someone logs out.
